about_the_game:
Welcome to ToBas Zombies - The Low-Poly Zombie Shooter!


ToBas Zombies is an action-packed multiplayer and singleplayer shooter in the low-poly style. In this game, you will fight against countless zombies and try to survive for as long as possible.

Features


  • Various NPCs sell you weapons, perks (WIP), and health packs.
  • There are different types of zombies with varying strengths.
  • There are handcrafted maps and unlockable barriers.
  • Zombies spawn relentlessly, making the game an exciting battle for survival.
  • You have a choice of 34 different weapons, each with six different colors (WIP). Some weapons must be unlocked first.
  • In Steam multiplayer, you can play with up to 4 players.

Please note: Some features are still in development and may contain bugs (marked with *WIP).

Your feedback is important to us!


Do you have ideas or feedback about the game? Join our and share your ideas!

How to play ToBas Zombies


In singleplayer or multiplayer mode (experimental), you start a round and buy a starting weapon from the NPC. Once all players are armed, the game begins. Your goal is to survive for as long as possible. Each round is an endless game. The game ends when all players are dead.

For each zombie you kill, you earn gold and experience points. You can spend the gold on new weapons, perks (*WIP), and health packs. With experience points, you increase your level and unlock new weapons and perks (*WIP).

Are you ready for the fight? Grab your weapon and join other players to battle the zombies!
